change_summary.what_changed: The download options for the Windsurf Editor changed from macOS to Windows
specific_changes: Download options updated from macOS (Apple Silicon and Intel) to Windows (x64 and arm64)

market_signals: Windsurf is continuing to support multiple platforms
strategic_analysis.business_impact: The change may slightly improve user experience for Windows users, but it is unlikely to have a significant impact on the business
strategic_analysis.strategic_direction: Windsurf is likely to continue supporting multiple platforms and improving user experience
strategic_analysis.competitive_implications: The change is unlikely to affect Windsurf's competitive position

threats: If Windsurf does not continue to support multiple platforms, it may lose users to competitors
opportunities: Windsurf could consider adding more platform support to attract more users
recommended_actions: Monitor user feedback on the updated download options
Consider adding support for more platforms

business_impact: The change may slightly improve user experience for Windows users, but it is unlikely to have a significant impact on the business
competitive_implications: The change is unlikely to affect Windsurf's competitive position
